name: EN_PROFILE
description: Selects the Enshrouded profile template on first bootstrap (fresh volume).

name: MANAGER_PROFILE
description: Selects the Server Manager profile template on first bootstrap (fresh volume).

name: BACKUP_CRON
description: Cron schedule for scheduled backup job (writes to BACKUP_DIR/scheduled).

name: BACKUP_MAX_COUNT
description: Number of savegame zip backups to keep (0 = unlimited).

name: RESTART_CHECK_PLAYERS
description: Only restart when 0 players are connected.

name: UPDATE_CHECK_PLAYERS
description: Only update when 0 players are connected.

name: SERVER_PRE_HOOK
description: Hook executed before server start job.

name: SERVER_POST_HOOK
description: Hook executed after server stop job.

name: CMD_PRE_HOOK
description: Hook executed before cmd command dispatch.

name: CMD_POST_HOOK
description: Hook executed after cmd command dispatch.

name: MENU_PRE_HOOK
description: Hook executed before interactive menu job.

name: MENU_POST_HOOK
description: Hook executed after interactive menu job.
